items.title: Saving Satoshi
items.description: An interactive science fiction game designed to inspire a generation to fall in love with bitcoin.

items.title: The Bitcoiner's Intro to Rust
items.description: Build a raw transaction decoder from scratch in Rust. Topics covered include types, data structures, references, stack and the heap, traits, error handling and more.

items.title: Bitcoin Development Philosophy
items.description: Insights and understanding into bitcoin's design trade-offs & development philosophy.

items.description: The classic Bitcoin technical resource—enhanced and expanded in its third edition.

items.title: Mastering Lightning
items.description: The most comprehensive technical book on Lightning, prepare for real complexity.

items.title: Tinybitcoinkeeper
items.description: Playfully explore Bitcoin’s network dynamics with 150 lines of Python.

items.title: Learn Bitcoin From Command Line
items.description: Hands-on guide to node-based transactions, scripting, and hidden-services setup.

items.title: Transaction Tutorial
items.description: Master SegWit, Taproot, sighashes, and timelocks with local Bitcoin scripting.

items.title: Chaincode Lightning
items.description: Curated program on Lightning development with discussions and hands-on cohort sessions.

items.title: Building on LN
items.description: Build a Lightning graph visualizer, paid-invoice ownership game, and TypeScript.

items.title: Schnorr Taproot
items.description: Learn Schnorr signatures, MuSig aggregation, and Taproot hands-on in Jupyter.

items.title: Cryptography camp workbook
items.description: Learn cryptographic security and proofs through a practical, hands-on workbook.
